query:
ALTER TABLE `ai_drift_metrics_history` 
ADD COLUMN `accuracy_drop` decimal(10,6),
ADD COLUMN `feature_drift` decimal(10,6),
ADD COLUMN `prediction_drift` decimal(10,6),
ADD COLUMN `severity` varchar(20),
ADD COLUMN `timestamp` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
